attributes.additional_details:
Make England a place to be proud of.
Stop allowing convicted criminals positions of power
Make it law that English history is to be taught to all school children
Have a national day - St Georges Day
Stop allowing Brussels ruling our country, especially on issues like Abu Katada
 Fly the flag of Saint George or the Union Jack
 Let the world know -
WE WANT OUR ENGLAND BACK !!!!

rejection.details: The specific issues in the petition are covered in existing e-petitions.
